Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line and Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line and Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Ashland/Lake due to a sick customer.. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line and Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Ashland/Lake due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #9 Ashland and #20 Madison buses.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
